description: This file provides functions for accessing environment variables and application settings related to database configuration, including caching of settings.

methods.name: str|None get_env(key: str, default: str | None = None)
methods.description: Retrieves an environment variable's value with an optional default.

methods.name: dict get_settings()
methods.description: Returns a dictionary containing application settings, particularly the database URL, loaded from environment variables.

ctags.name: get_env
ctags.pattern: /^def get_env(key: str, default: str | None = None) -> str | None:$/
